sense.gloss: bracelet (made of stringed jewels or bells and worn at the elbow)
bracer (for the elbow of an archer)
collecting, collection, collation, gathering, arrangement, coordination
x: 取りまとめる・とりまとめる

sense.gloss: bulk buying, buying in quantity, stocking up (on)
to follow around, to shadow, to tag along
to haunt one (e.g. feeling, failure), to follow one
to collect, to gather, to compile, to assemble
to put on, to wear, to be clothed in, to be clad in, to be dressed in, to be wrapped in

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓の↑民話↑↓みんわ↓を↑教科書↑↓きょうかしょ↓↑用↑↓よう↓に↑纏↑↓まと↓めた。
sdata.e: He compiled a Japanese folklore anthology for use in schools.

sdata.j: 「お↑前↑↓まえ↓、どこの↑子↑↓こ↓だ？」↑足↑↓あし↓に↑纏↑↓まつ↓わりついてきたのは、↑小↑↓ちい↓さな↑子猫↑↓こねこ↓だった。↑灰色↑↓はいいろ↓の↑縞↑↓しま↓↑模様↑↓もよう↓のふわふわした↑猫↑↓ねこ↓だ。
sdata.e: Who do you belong to? Wrapped around his feet was a small cat. It was a fluffy grey striped cat.

sdata.j: それについて、↑決↑↓き↓められた↑字数↑↓じすう↓↑以内↑↓いない↓に↑作文↑↓さくぶん↓を↑纏↑↓まと↓める。
sdata.e: Compile an essay on that topic within a fixed number of letters.

sdata.j: ↑火事↑↓かじ↓の↑時↑↓とき↓は、↑火↑↓ひ↓の↑粉↑↓こ↓をかぶらないように↑何↑↓なに↓か↑纏↑↓まつわ↓ったほうがいい。
sdata.e: When there's a fire, you should wrap yourself with something so that sparks don't land on you.
